::Hot Rod::

Since DeathScythe is cloaked, Hot Rod doesn't see the blast untill the
last second. He attemps to jump out of the way, he's to late, as the
blast hits him in the right thy. Hot Rod slumps to the ground.
"Firearm, a little help! You're gonna PAY!"
Hot Rod's shoulder blasters pop up, and fires two rockets at
DeathScythe.
